predicate.note: Frames file for 're-elect' based on adding 're' to the beginning of each example of 'elect' in elect.xml.

example.name: absentee voters
example.text: JP Bolduc was re-elected *trace* a director.

example.name: hey, whaddya know, it does occur in the active voice
example.text: Holders at the meeting re-elected a full slate of Canadian Express nominees to Enfield's 11-member board.
example.arg: a full slate of Canadian Express nominees
